TopicTitle: KSP's on sale at The Humble Store for a Limited Time!

Articles.Content: <p><a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/54f228792698f618e2db649dc763a9d5/tumblr_inline_ncbmvknMO91rr2wit.png"/></strong></a><span>Kerbal<em> Space Program</em> has once again returned to the sale rack of <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>THE HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>! You have less than two days grab the game for 40% off the regular price and contribute to some fine charities while doing so. Get into orbit before 0.25 and purchase <em>KSP</em> today.<br/></span></p>

Oh, hey, this again.

Already got the game of course, so... eh.
I've already purchased KSP, but I would like to have it in my Steam library. Do you get steam keys in the Humble Bundle?

I've already purchased KSP, but I would like to have it in my Steam library. Do you get steam keys in the Humble Bundle?

Yes the Humble bundle is mostly Steam only.
